titleStmt.title: A display of heraldry manifesting a more easie access to the knowledge thereof than hath been hitherto published by any, through the benefit of method : whereunto it is now reduced by the study and industry of John Guillim ...
titleStmt.author: Guillim, John, 1565-1621.
Barkham, John, 1572?-1642.
Logan, John, 17th cent.

editionStmt.edition: The fifth edition much enlarged with great variety of bearings : to which is added A treatise of honour military and civil, according to the laws and customs of England /

biblFull.extent: [12], 317, [9], 181, [8] p., 73 plates : ill., coats of arms, ports.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Roycroft for R. Blome, and are sold by Francis Tyton, Henry Brome, Thomas Basset, Richard Chiswell, John Wright, and Thomas Sawbridge,

notesStmt.note: Plates partly printed on both sides.
Attributed also to John Barkham. Cf. DNB.
Imperfect: A treatise of honour, military and civil ... is lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
